ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter

Class CompactConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter.SerializableConverter<T>
      • ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter.CompactConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to convert
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<T>

    public class CompactConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends SerializableConverter<T>
    Uses a customized compact representation to serialize an object and back. If no customized compact representation exists, it uses Java serialization as fallback strategy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompactConverter()
      Constructs a converter that uses the standard Java class loader to deserialize the object.
      CompactConverter(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Constructs a converter that uses the specified ClassLoader to deserialize the object.

    • Method Summary

      Deserializes a byte array into an object.

      Serializes an object into a byte array.
